area: all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Ranger's Bramble](/Spells.aspx?ID=775)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 235 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Area** all squares that contain plants in a 5-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You cause plants in the area to entangle your foes, with the effects of [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103). A creature that critically fails the save takes 2d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) in addition to being [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24). Escaping your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1d4.
name: Ranger's Bramble

A creature that critically fails the save takes 2d4 persistent bleed damage in addition to being immobilized. Escaping your bramble doesn't end the bleed damage. --- Heightened (+1) The bleed damage on a critical failure increases by 1d4.
